texts.about-text: Frontier technologies that will change how we live, work requires long-term commitment and vision. Most funds are focused on individual companies. We have a 25 year plan to invest in the creation of products to become the gateway, rails, and foundations to develop new markets, and grow nascent ones.

texts.global-title: TECHNOLOGY IS GLOBAL. SO ARE WE AT DAOVERSE CAPITAL
texts.global-text: Decentralized teams with an unparalleled depth and breadth of relationships to maximize opportunities without borders.

texts.ecosystem-text-1: Add value to the ecosystem and all participants within DAOs, as long as they have data-based governance and a reputation management system, will partake in the value we co-create.
texts.ecosystem-text-2: A practical framework of aligned incentives will allow for us to build a better world together.
texts.ecosystem-text-3: Metaverse: Immersive inclusion for user acquisition and retention based on fairness, and transparency.
texts.ecosystem-text-4: Biotechnology: technology to augment humans
texts.ecosystem-text-5: Hybrid Solutions: the best of DeFi, NFT, SoFi, GameFi, E-commerce and Life Sciences

texts.investing-text-1: DAOVERSE CAPITAL spearheads and fervently champions the advancement of groundbreaking technology, aiming to significantly enhance social productivity and elevate the quality of life across communities.
texts.investing-text-11: Web3 DeFi: Peer to Peer Social Lending

texts.fund-text-1: Private pre-sale opportunities in crypto for products based on: blockchain, web3, metaverse, utility enable NFTs, DeFi, GameFI, SoFi, and other cutting-edge tools and business models.
texts.fund-text-2: With a combined 30-year track record in traditional finance, alternative and digital assets, and hedge funds, we screen investments with an eye towards long-term value.
texts.fund-text-3: All of our GPs are ultra-high net worth individuals with a background in scaling capital.
texts.fund-text-4: We steward infrastructural technologies developed by top research scientists and promising founders, finding opportunities through a global network of active entrepreneurs.

texts.contact-text-6: HQ : Penthouse,Gate Village 7, DIFC, Dubai, UAE

texts.footer-text-1: DAOVERSE CAPITAL spearheads and fervently champions the advancement of groundbreaking technology, aiming to significantly enhance social productivity and elevate the quality of life across communities.
texts.footer-text-2: Daoverse Capital is a company registered under cayman Islands
